plot outline: Sai a liberal women and has her own views about injustice happening to women in society she works for a film director.Sai's work place is based in Dream Mall her boss is coming up with an horror film and wants Sai to completely type the whole script in a day be it leaving late from office.Sai along with Sachin and a colleague sit till late night to complete her work but the two suddenly disappear and she is trapped inside the mall with the psycho security guard who starts to abuse and mentally torture her.
title: Dream Mall
plot: story of a survival of a girl working/living in a town. A girl is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a Shopping Mall. What happens that night? Whether she succeeds or fails?

Sai a liberal women and has her own views about injustice happening to women in society she works for a film director.Sai's work place is based in _Dream Mall_ (qv) her boss is coming up with an horror film and wants Sai to completely type the whole script in a day be it leaving late from office.Sai along with Sachin and a colleague sit till late night to complete her work but the two suddenly disappear and she is trapped inside the mall with the psycho security guard who starts to abuse and mentally torture her.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
